HERO.TITLE: Hi, I'm Steven!
HERO.SUBTITLE: Full-stack Developer
HERO.SUBTITLE_TWO: Systems Engineer & Software Developer. I enjoy exploring new frontiers and building solutions that challenge the conventional.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am passionate about technology and programming, with skills in web application development and information systems. I stand out for my ability to work in teams, my commitment to quality and my focus on problem solving. I love learning and facing new challenges, and I am always looking for opportunities to grow and improve my skills.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: +2 years of professional experience as Systems Engineer in Full-stack Development. Skilled in programming, databases and seamless user experience reation. Expert in modern technologies and good development practices, focused on creating robust and scalable solutions.

JOB_2.TITLE: Software Developer
JOB_2.SUBTITLE: Technology Infosys
JOB_2.DESCRIPTION: Contributed to the development and implementation of a comprehensive management system for a Health Services Provider Institution (IPS) using Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. I focused on building reusable components and integrating APIs to streamline staff management. Collaborating closely with the backend team, I ensured efficient data transmission, delivering a robust and scalable solution while meeting project deadlines.

JOB_FREE.TITLE: Software Developer
JOB_FREE.SUBTITLE: Freelance Project
JOB_FREE.DESCRIPTION: Developed administration systems with Vue.js and Vuetify in the frontend for dynamic interfaces, and Django Rest Framework in the backend. Implemented CRUD operations and endpoints for efficient data manipulation.

JOB_1.TITLE: Junior Systems Analyst
JOB_1.SUBTITLE: Solarium Energy S.A.S
JOB_1.DESCRIPTION: Analyzed requirements and programmed information systems with HTML5, JavaScript and CSS. Managed the teacher evaluation at the Universidad Piloto de Colombia and collaborated in the installation of systems for dental and radiological clinics, ensuring their efficiency and suitability to specific needs.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Discover my recent works
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Be inspired by my featured work, where creativity and technical skill come together in unique projects.

PROJECT_1.TITLE: Task Management System
PROJECT_1.DESCRIPTION: Developed a task management system with ReactJS and Firebase, allowing users to create, edit, and delete tasks, and mark them as completed. Implemented user authentication and real-time data storage.

PROJECT_2.TITLE: Portfolio Site
PROJECT_2.DESCRIPTION: This portfolio is the result of a structured and professional approach to simulate a real work environment. I developed this platform to showcase my projects, skills and experience. Each section reflects my growth as a software developer.
